title: Make the game a little easier for the host will you
desc:
Post 1422
- Choose up to 3 cards in your hand. For each card chosen, list two reasonable interpretations of what the card’s wording means. If the host agrees that the card could be interpreted in multiple ways, discard that card.
- If the host wants to, they can give the chosen cards to the people who made them, if they’re in game.
